item.title: Master 2 - Human Computer Interaction: Reconstructing Myself in 3D with Gaussian Splatting (Unity)
item.description: A hybrid scientific and practical exploration of Gaussian Splatting, including theory, pipeline, and a personal 3D reconstruction imported into Unity.
